# helloworld

    ServerName helloworld.vagrant.dev
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html/helloworld

    <Directory "/var/www/html/helloworld">
        Options All
        AllowOverride All
        Order Allow,Deny
        Allow from all
    </Directory>
</VirtualHost>
